alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued November 14 at 9:22PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE WILMER POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR IAN AGUILAR, HISPANIC, MALE, 10 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 0 INCHES, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES. VICTIM WAS LAST SEEN AT 730 AM ON NOVEMBER 14 2023, AT THE 20 BLOCK OF OAKDALE ST, WILMER, TEXAS 75172 WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR JUAN AGUILAR-CANO, 38 YEARS OLD, WHITE, MALE, 5 FEET 7 INCHES, 160 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BLACK EYES AND LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A TAN, 2007, CHEVROLET, TAHOE BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER K V Z 1 1 9 4. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN WILMER, TEXAS LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE WILMER POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 7 2 4 4 1 6 5 6 5. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS WILMER POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 7 2 4 4 1 6 5 6 5.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata
